steps.content: Put the buttered sandwiches into the frying pan/skillet. Fry over medium heat until the base turns golden brown. This will be about 4 to 5 minutes. [6] X Research source

steps.content: Remove from the heat when golden brown both sides. Plate up and serve. Allow the diner to cut the sandwich; the cheese will ooze a little. Be careful; jam or preserves retain heat well.
